game.name: 重生之再战高考 Reborn: Examine Again
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Reborn: Examine Again" is a Roguelike game that mainly offers the experience of deck building. What you need to do is to select the appropriate cards to add to your deck and then wait for the wonderful chemical reactions they produce.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Reborn: Examine Again" is a Roguelike game that mainly offers the experience of deck building. What you need to do is to select the appropriate cards to add to your deck and then wait for the wonderful chemical reactions they produce.
